channel.title: Help? please
channel.description:
1.) I don't know the coding for these commands and I need them...
::tele ::mypos
2.) How do I put/add NPC's onto my server? (newb question =P )
Thanks!

item.title: Help? please
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Answers-
The tele command.

        else if (command.startsWith("tele") && playerRights >= 2) { {
                int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5, 9));
                int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10, 14));

                teleportToX = newPosX;
                teleportToY = newPosY;
            }
                	
        }

The MYPOS command.

        } else if (command.startsWith("mypos")) {
            sendMessage("You are standing on X=" + absX + " Y=" + absY);

Answer to number 2-
NPC adding and editing would be found in Autospawn.cfg.

Read full topic
